newsitem.title: USA: Logic Works sees Q3 loss.
newsitem.headline: Logic Works sees Q3 loss.

text.p: Logic Works Inc said Friday that it expects to report a third quarter loss for the period ending September 30.
The company also said it expects revenues to be about 25 percent higher than the year-ago period.
The company reported diluted earnings of $0.04 per share on net income of $394,000 for the last year's third quarter.
The company said it is taking action to drive revenue growth and reduce costs to "achieve improved operating margins during 1997."
The company said it could not estimate the loss.
Trading on Logic Works was halted at 1601 EDT with a last sale of 8 1/8.
The company said it will report its earnings on October 22.
